price: Ṣùgbọ́n àwọn tó bẹ̀rù Olúwa wọn, àwọn Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra tí àwọn odò ń ṣàn ní ìsàlẹ̀ rẹ̀ ń bẹ fún wọn. Olùṣegbére ni wọ́n nínú rẹ̀. Ibùdésí kan ni láti ọ̀dọ̀ Allāhu. Ohun tí ń bẹ lọ́dọ̀ Allāhu sì lóore jùlọ fún àwọn ẹni rere.
arabic: لَٰكِنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ رَبَّهُمۡ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا نُزُلٗا مِّنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِۗ وَمَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ لِّلۡأَبۡرَارِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: lākini alladhīna ittaqaw rabbahum lahum jannātun tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā nuzulan min ʿindi al-lahi wamā ʿinda al-lahi khayrun lil'abrāri
